Inspiring.author: Pablo Picasso
Inspiring.content: Every child is an artist; the problem is staying an artist when you grow up

Inspiring.author: Scott Adams
Inspiring.content: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep

Inspiring.author: Invajy
Inspiring.content: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity

Inspiring.author: Thomas Jefferson
Inspiring.content: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have

Happiness.author: Audrey Hepburn
Happiness.content: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy. It's all that matters

Happiness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Happiness.content: Nothing can bring you happiness but yourself

Happiness.author: Mark Twain
Happiness.content: Never regret anything that made you smile

Happiness.author: Leo Tolstoy
Happiness.content: If you want to be happy, be

Morning.author: Glen Cook
Morning.content: Morning is wonderful. Its only drawback is that it comes at such an inconvenient time of day

Morning.author: James Lileks
Morning.content: I love the early hours of the day. It's a nice place to visit but I wouldn't want to live there

Morning.author: Punit Ghadge
Morning.content: Keep the dream alive: Hit the snooze button

Morning.author: Marlo Thomas
Morning.content: Never face facts; if you do you'll never get up in the morning

Morning.author: Marty Rubin
Morning.content: Morning will come, it has no choice

Love.author: William Shakespeare
Love.content: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none

Love.author: Richard Bach
Love.content: True love stories never have endings

Love.author: Saint Ignatius
Love.content: Love is shown more in deeds than in words

Love.author: Franklin P. Jones
Love.content: Love is what makes the ride worthwhile

Love.author: Nikki Giovanni
Love.content: We love because it's the only true adventure

Wisdom.author: Nelson Mandela
Wisdom.content: Speaking to someone in their language goes to their heart

Wisdom.author: Lewis Carroll
Wisdom.content: If you don't know where you are going, any road will get you there

Wisdom.author: Lao Tzu
Wisdom.content: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step

Wisdom.author: Socrates
Wisdom.content: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing

Wisdom.author: Aristotle
Wisdom.content: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom
